src:
Kandidát na najbrutálnejšie K.O. roka: Lee vypol Gillespieho ukážkovou kombináciou
Duel zatienil hlavný chod večera, ktorým bol zápas Masvidal vs Diaz.
04 Nov 2019, 09:04 by NEW YORK/kc
Hlavným súbojom turnaja UFC 244 v newyorskej Madison Square Garden bola síce konfrontácia medzi Jorgem Masvidalom a Nateom Diazom, no najväčší ohlas mal knokaut, ktorý predviedol Kevin Lee. Američan poslal k zemi Gregora Gillespieho už na konci 1. kola.
Lee si ukážkovou kombináciou vyslúžil veľký potlesk publika - Gillespieho si najskôr „pripravil" pravým hákom, aby ho ho následne uspal vysokým kopom do brady.
Pre Gillespieho to bolá prvá prehra v profesionálnej kariére (13-1), Lee upravil svoju zápasovú bilanciu na 18 výhier a 5 prehier.
WTF !! Kevin Lee just killed a man #UFC244 pic.twitter.com/yScFd14pE8 - Abd El Rahman Hesham (RahmanRMCF) November 3, 2019
text:
Candidate for the most brutal K.O. of the year: Lee turned off Gillespie's showcase combination
Duel overshadowed the main course of the evening, which was the match Masvidal vs Diaz.
04 Nov 2019, 09:04 by NEW YORK
The main battle of the UFC 244 at Madison Square Garden in New York was the confrontation between Jorge Masvidal and Nate Diaz, but the greatest response was the knockout by Kevin Lee. The American sent Gregor Gillespie to the ground at the end of Round 1.
Lee's showcase combination earned a big applause from the audience - he first prepared "Gillespie" with his right hook to put him to a high kick in his chin.
For Gillespie, this was the first loss in his professional career (13-1), Lee adjusted his match balance to 18 wins and 5 losses.
WTF !! Kevin Lee Just Killed A Man # UFC244 pic.twitter.com/yScFd14pE8 - Abd El Rahman Hesham (RahmanRMCF) Nov. 3, 2019
